response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, representing years of innovation and dedication. We are extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. We believe this offer presents an exceptional chance for you to secure a remarkable asset at a favorable rate. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of welcoming you as a distinguished owner of this unique creation.", "product_price": 1200000}
